Add possibility for Mnemonics to user configurable field labels. Potentially automatically generate mnemonics for those labels, which are configured in the properties/info. The theory is that most people will not be able to do it correctly or even understand it. It could be done by giving a method the label names and the preconfigured mnemonics for the view and menus. The function should then make a pool of remaining letters from the labels and find a distribution, where as many as possible can get a mnemonic, preferably the first letter(s).
